description:
Aoi has a fever but tells the students to go to university. While Miyabi performs the medical care of her patient, Kaoru cleans the mansion, Tina does the laundry, and Taeko makes dinner. But both Tina and Taeko fail miserably, and at the end of a long day the mansion is still at a mess.
On the next day, Kaoru has off at university, and with him advising the girls at work, miraculously everything work much smoother now. Finally, even Aoi`s fever is going down but she still needs special treatment.
